code: @Override protected RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(RestRequest restRequest, NodeClient client) throws IOException {     String datafeedId = restRequest.param(DatafeedConfig.ID.getPreferredName()).     if (datafeedId == null) {         datafeedId = GetDatafeedsAction.ALL.     }     GetDatafeedsAction.Request request = new GetDatafeedsAction.Request(datafeedId).     request.setAllowNoDatafeeds(restRequest.paramAsBoolean(GetDatafeedsAction.Request.ALLOW_NO_DATAFEEDS.getPreferredName(), request.allowNoDatafeeds())).     return channel -> client.execute(GetDatafeedsAction.INSTANCE, request, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
